methods.name: id
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#id
methods.description: Breakpoint identifier, unique in the scope of the debuggee.

methods.name: id=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#id=
methods.description: Breakpoint identifier, unique in the scope of the debuggee.

methods.name: action
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#action
methods.description: Action to take when a breakpoint is hit. Either :CAPTURE or :LOG.

methods.name: action=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#action=
methods.description: Action to take when a breakpoint is hit. Either :CAPTURE or :LOG.

methods.name: log_message_format
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#log_message_format
methods.description: Only relevant when action is LOG. Defines the message to log when the breakpoint hits. The message may include parameter placeholders $0, $1, etc. These placeholders are replaced with the evaluated value of the appropriate expression. Expressions not referenced in logMessageFormat are not logged.

methods.name: log_message_format=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#log_message_format=
methods.description: Only relevant when action is LOG. Defines the message to log when the breakpoint hits. The message may include parameter placeholders $0, $1, etc. These placeholders are replaced with the evaluated value of the appropriate expression. Expressions not referenced in logMessageFormat are not logged.

methods.name: log_level
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#log_level
methods.description: Indicates the severity of the log. Only relevant when action is LOG.

methods.name: log_level=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#log_level=
methods.description: Indicates the severity of the log. Only relevant when action is LOG.

methods.name: evaluated_log_message
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#evaluated_log_message
methods.description: The evaluated log message when action is LOG.

methods.name: evaluated_log_message=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#evaluated_log_message=
methods.description: The evaluated log message when action is LOG.

methods.name: location
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#location
methods.description: Breakpoint source location.

methods.name: location=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#location=
methods.description: Breakpoint source location.

methods.name: condition
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#condition
methods.description: Condition that triggers the breakpoint. The condition is a compound boolean expression composed using expressions in a programming language at the source location.

methods.name: condition=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#condition=
methods.description: Condition that triggers the breakpoint. The condition is a compound boolean expression composed using expressions in a programming language at the source location.

methods.name: is_final_state
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#is_final_state
methods.description: When true, indicates that this is a final result and the breakpoint state will not change from here on.

methods.name: is_final_state=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#is_final_state=
methods.description: When true, indicates that this is a final result and the breakpoint state will not change from here on.

methods.name: expressions
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#expressions
methods.description: List of read-only expressions to evaluate at the breakpoint location. The expressions are composed using expressions in the programming language at the source location. If the breakpoint action is LOG, the evaluated expressions are included in log statements.

methods.name: expressions=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#expressions=
methods.description: List of read-only expressions to evaluate at the breakpoint location. The expressions are composed using expressions in the programming language at the source location. If the breakpoint action is LOG, the evaluated expressions are included in log statements.

methods.name: evaluated_expressions
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#evaluated_expressions
methods.description: Values of evaluated expressions at breakpoint time. The evaluated expressions appear in exactly the same order they are listed in the expressions field. The name field holds the original expression text, the value or members field holds the result of the evaluated expression. If the expression cannot be evaluated, the status inside the Variable will indicate an error and contain the error text.

methods.name: evaluated_expressions=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#evaluated_expressions=
methods.description: Values of evaluated expressions at breakpoint time. The evaluated expressions appear in exactly the same order they are listed in the expressions field. The name field holds the original expression text, the value or members field holds the result of the evaluated expression. If the expression cannot be evaluated, the status inside the Variable will indicate an error and contain the error text.

title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#create_time
methods.description: Time this breakpoint was created by the server in seconds resolution.

methods.name: create_time=

Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#create_time=
methods.description: Time this breakpoint was created by the server in seconds resolution.

title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#final_time
methods.description: Time this breakpoint was finalized as seen by the server in seconds resolution.

methods.name: final_time=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#final_time=
methods.description: Time this breakpoint was finalized as seen by the server in seconds resolution.

methods.name: user_email
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#user_email
methods.description: E-mail address of the user that created this breakpoint

methods.name: user_email=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#user_email=
methods.description: E-mail address of the user that created this breakpoint

methods.name: status
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#status
methods.description:
Breakpoint status.

The status includes an error flag and a human readable message. This field is usually unset. The message can be either informational or an error message. Regardless, clients should always display the text message back to the user.

Error status indicates complete failure of the breakpoint.

methods.name: status=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#status=
methods.description:
Breakpoint status.

The status includes an error flag and a human readable message. This field is usually unset. The message can be either informational or an error message. Regardless, clients should always display the text message back to the user.

Error status indicates complete failure of the breakpoint.

methods.name: labels
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#labels
methods.description: A set of custom breakpoint properties, populated by the agent, to be displayed to the user.

methods.name: labels=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#labels=
methods.description: A set of custom breakpoint properties, populated by the agent, to be displayed to the user.

methods.name: stack_frames
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#stack_frames
methods.description: The stack at breakpoint time.

methods.name: stack_frames=
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#stack_frames=
methods.description: The stack at breakpoint time.

methods.name: complete
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#complete
methods.description: Marks a breakpoint as complete if this breakpoint isn’t completed already. Set @is_final_state to true and set @final_time.

methods.name: path
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#path
methods.description: Get the file path of this breakpoint

returns.description: The file path for this breakpoint

methods.name: line
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#line
methods.description: Get the line number of this breakpoint

returns.description: The line number for this breakpoint

methods.name: check_condition
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#check_condition
methods.description: Evaluate the breakpoint’s condition expression against a given binding object. Returns true if the condition expression evalutes to true; false if error happens or the expression evaluates to false.

returns.description:
True if condition evalutes to true, false if
condition evaluates to false or error raised during evaluation.

methods.name: evaluate
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#evaluate
methods.description: Evaluate the breakpoint unless it’s already marked as completed. Store evaluted results in @evaluated_expressions, @stack_frames, and @evaluated_log_message, depends on the action of breakpoint. Mark breakpoint complete if successfully evaluated a breakpoint with :CAPTURE action.

params.name: call_stack_bindings
params.description:
An array of Ruby Binding
objects, from the call stack that leads to the triggering of the
breakpoints.

returns.description: True if evaluated successfully; false otherwise.

methods.name: eql?
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#eql?
methods.description: Check if two breakpoints are equal to each other

methods.name: set_error_state
title: Google
Cloud
Debugger
Breakpoint#set_error_state
methods.description: Set breakpoint to an error state, which initializes the @status instance variable with the error message. Also mark this breakpoint as completed if is_final is true.

params.name: refers_to
params.description:
Enum that specifies what the error refers to. Defaults
:UNSPECIFIED.

params.name: is_final
params.description:
Marks the breakpoint as final if true.
Defaults true.

returns.description:
The grpc
StatusMessage object, which describes the breakpoint’s error state.
